markdown.markdown:
I am Samdani Ansar and I am a PostDoctoral Fellow student in the [Strucural Bioinformatics & Cheinformatics](https://www.icoa.fr/fr/bonnet) group of [Prof. Dr. Pascal Bonnet](https://www.icoa.fr/fr/bonnet/equipe) at the [Institut de Chimie Organique et Analytique](https://www.icoa.fr/) (ICOA). I work under the supervision of [Samia ACI-SÈCHE](https://www.icoa.fr/fr/content/samia-aci-s%C3%A8che) on Computational PROTAC modelling. I did my Ph.D. in Bioinformatics from SASTRA Deemed to be University, India under [DBT-JRF fellowship](https://www.dbtjrf.gov.in/). I have also qualified and ranked 8th in the [DBT-BINC](https://dbtindia.gov.in/schemes-programmes/building-capacities/national-fellowships/bioinformatics-national-certification) exam. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### Education

{{< fa graduation-cap title="A graduation cap" >}} **Ph.D in Bioinformatics, 2021**

SASTRA Deemed to be University, Thanjavur, India

{{< fa graduation-cap title="A graduation cap" >}} **B.Tech in BioTechnology, 2015**

Rajalakshmi Engineering College, Chennai, India

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### Experience

{{< fa computer >}} **Post-Doctoral Fellow, May 2022 - present**

Institut de Chimie Organique et Analytique, France

{{< fa computer >}} **Research Associate, Sep 2021 - Apr 2022**

Vision Research Foundation, India

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### Achievements

{{< fa medal >}} **Bioinformatics National Certification Exam (DBT‑BINC), 2018**

All India ranking - 8th

{{< fa medal >}} **DBT - JRF Fellowship, 2015**

Category - I

{{< fa medal >}} **Graduate Aptitude Test in Engineering (GATE), 2015**

All India ranking - 1571

{{< fa medal >}} **Anna University Rank holder, 2018**

University 8th
